original_title: Så nära får ingen gå - ett år med Kent
overview: A documentary filmed 2000-2001 about Swedish rock band Kent as they play at sold out halls in Sweden and at the Roskilde Festival's biggest stage, but also at small clubs around Europe. They visit their hometown of Eskilstuna, meeting devoted fans with occasional festivities in the hotel room.
title: Så nära får ingen gå - ett år med Kent
